resources.string: Always check the URL of the site. The most important part of the URL is between the first double slashes "//" and the first single slash "/" e.g. http://www.ucd.ie/
All websites that require you to login should use encryption to help insure that your information remains safe. You should also check that the address starts with “https://” rather than just “http://
When you\'re looking at the URL, look carefully for any subtle misspellings in the domain name.
You sucessfully completed the round 1 of the quiz, Kudos! as you are smart enough to identify any fake url
Keep an eye on the watch, the clock is ticking real fast!
Oops, Sorry you went out of lives
